en-US.name: Rich Girl Coach
en-US.summary: Ask the Rich Girl Code GPT to help with business funding, credit, and investment strategy.
en-US.description: This skill connects to your Rich Girl Code GPT assistant for help with business fundability, credit building, and wealth planning.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Rich Girl Coach how to get business credit
Alexa, ask Rich Girl Coach about dividend stocks
